pullrequest.title: (For later review) Split the implementation of template functions

content.raw:
Michael pointed out the following issue with ign-math. The auto-generated header file, in this case `transport.hh`, includes all the files in the `detail` sub-folder. The `Node.hh` file also includes the `detail/Node.hh` file. This is a bit redundant, and the `detail` subfolder includes in `transport.hh` tend to be placed above the other includes . I worked around this with:

    ign_install_all_headers(EXCLUDE_DIRS detail)
    install(DIRECTORY detail DESTINATION ${IGN_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_FULL}/ignition/${IGN_DESIGNATION})

‌
